pages.text: The $(d)Lava Charm$() adds a temporary lava shield, visible above your armor bar.$(br2)While the shield is full, you will be $(a)completely immune to lava damage$(). However, it does $(c)not protect you from fire$()!$(br2)Lava will still light you on fire, and you will still take damage from that!. Maybe invest in an $(l:items/obsidian_skull)Obsidian Skull$(/l) as well?
pages.title: Lava Charm

pages.text: Lava Charms can be found rarely in $(3)dungeon chests$() and more commonly in $(3)Nether Fortress chests$().
